query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'tracks' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%audio%'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2yoFfYif5LNxbni.536e2831ff0e --database ZpobkhoyuogEaApEUcL3SK --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'tracks' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%audio%'
